commentary_sequence.speaker: Analyst
commentary_sequence.text: The Panthers' power play needs to make Edmonton pay here. That Reinhart shot that almost went in shows they're hungry for more.

commentary_sequence.speaker: Host
commentary_sequence.text: If Florida can convert here, extending their lead to two goals, it will put even more pressure on Skinner and the Oilers' defense.
